## Connection.targetBlock() method

Returns the block that this connection connects to.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
targetBlock(): Block | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Block](./blockly.block_class.md) \| null

The connected block or null if none is connected.
